Ping An Home Insurance
Ping An Home Insurance Plan Ping An Anti-epidemic Home Package
Provide comprehensive cover for the insured, his/her family, domestic helper and pets. Get the policy certificate within 5 minutes. HK$1,000,000
Ping An Home Insurance Benefits
Home Contents
Ping An Home Insurance covers damage to home contents caused by unforeseen accidents including fire, gas explosion, flooding, burglary, etc. The maximum coverage for each item is HK$150,000 for any one event and the maximum annual benefit is HK$1,000,000.
Domestic Helper's Property
Ping An Home Insurance provides cover for the loss or damage to the personal effects of your domestic helper caused by unforeseen accidents. The maximum annual benefit is HK$10,000.
Illegal Use of Credit Card/ Cover for Loss of Money
The insured enjoys protection against the authorized use of credit cards. The maximum annual benefit is HK$3,000. Also cover cash loss up to HK$2,500 annually due to accidents including robbery and burglary.
Alternative Accommodation
Ping An covers the cost of temporary accommodation, capped at HK$50,000 annually (HK$1,500/day) following the damage happened to the insured’s premise.
Legal Liability
Ping An covers any claims against the insured or his/her family members, dogs & cats only in the event of negligence causing bodily injury or property damage to a third party worldwide, excluding U.S.A and Canada.
24-hour Emergency Assistance Service
Ping An offers 24-hour home assistance hotline at +852 2851 1990 for free referral assistance, including home nursing or babysitting, plumber services, etc. Cover for locksmith assistance is also available, capped at HK$500.
Get Ping An Home Insurance Online
Applicants can apply for Ping An Home Insurance online, except for premises older than 40 years. No documents are required. Enjoy instant free quote and get your certificate in just five minutes. To get insurance for premises older than 40 years, please call +852 2827 1883. Otherwise, simply follow the steps below to get your property insured:
Step 1
Get an instant quote by entering the information for the insured property, including gross floor area, type of insured premises (under 5-storeys or not) and policy effective date.
Step 2
After you have received the quote, you can select the plan that suits you the most, then fill out the insured information including address and personal details.
Step 3
Finally, double-check the details you have entered and then proceed to payment. The policy certificate will be ready in 5 minutes.
Ping An Home Insurance Major Exclusions
Normal wear and tear and market depreciation
Mobile phones, computers and contact lenses
Personal items detained by the customs
Properties contained in the open generally, for example, aerials or satellite receivers
Unoccupied property for more than 45 consecutive days
Accidents in any unattended, convertible or open car

Ping An Home Insurance FAQ
Does Ping An Home Insurance cover replacement of personal documents?
Yes. Ping An Home Insurance covers the actual cost or fees incurred for replacing the loss of the passport, driving license, HKID card provided that the insured pay for the excess (min HK$250).
Does Ping An Home Insurance only cover the loss or damage of personal belongings caused by accidents happening within the household?
No. It provides coverage for loss of or damage to your personal effects happened worldwide. The maximum annual benefit is HK$20,000, capped at HK$2,500 per item.
Does Ping An Home Insurance cover replacement of windows, door locks and keys caused by burglary?
Yes. It covers the replacement of damaged windows, door locks and keys caused by burglary.
How to make a claim?
The insured needs to submit the home protection claim form to Ping An within 30 days from the date of the accident. For burglary/ robbery/ loss of cash, the insured is required to notify the police first.
